page.title: 04FARM ENVIRONMENT TEANASSIE
page.content: The environment is well suited to deer farming.The farmers are very happy in their environment. In their own words -"Its the greatest place on earth." They lead a very active outdoor life, and after a very full day on the hill, they often pursue their great love of Scottish Country Dancing, travelling often many miles to various classes a a few times a week. Initially, a lot of capital had to be spent on deer fencing, and as this has to be repaired periodically the expenditure is quite high. The one fear that the owners have is whether enough money can be made from the farming enterprise to meet the high costs of maintenance. They are so happy in their environment that they hope more city dwellers will come out to the country to visit the farm,and share their enjoyment.
